title: Best NodeJS Training course in Delhi, Noida | Coding Blocks

metas.name: description
metas.content: Coding Blocks is the best NodeJS training institute in Delhi, Noida, Dwarka, Jalandhar and Amritsar. Join beginner and advanced C++ courses.

aboutMentor.name: Sabeel Khan
aboutMentor.summary: Sabeel is a CS Graduate from JMI.A competitive programmar, with an undying passion for teaching.He is proficient with C++ and Web Development related technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript,NodeJS along with Python development.Web Series lover and always ready to explore new appetizing food.

openGraph.title: Web Development with NodeJS | Coding Blocks
openGraph.description: Coding Blocks is the best NodeJS training institute in Delhi, Noida, Dwarka, Jalandhar and Amritsar. Join beginner and advanced NodeJS courses.

courseMeta.title: Web Development with NodeJS
courseMeta.description: Learn building both backends and frontends with Javascript

studentsSay.name: Anshul Mittal
studentsSay.story: Coding Blocks helped in gaining enough experience to get internships at giants like Google and Rubrik.

studentsSay.name: Sidharth Bansal
studentsSay.story: Hii I am Sidharth Bansal from Delhi technology university. I have done competitive boot camp from coding blocks. This gave me a great exposure to problem solving mindset.

studentsSay.name: Samarth Jain
studentsSay.story: My journey in the world of Competitive Programming started with the Bootcamp at Coding Blocks, which turned out to be a changing point in my life. The immense amount of knowledge I got during the course did not only develop my interest but also made me pursue this field later. A special thanks to Shubham bhaiya, Mayank bhaiya and Prateek bhaiya for being the guiding lights in my journey and always motivating us to follow our passion!

highlights.head: Opportunities unlocked for learner
highlights.description: This Live Web Development course is a project-based Full-Stack web development course with a backend in Node.JS. As a part of these Web Development classes, the students will start off with the fundamentals of building basic websites and will go on to create more functional and complex portals using Node js and React also

highlights.head: Hands on Projects and Problems:
highlights.description: Build real-world applications like Create a responsive website using Bootstrap, Implementation of JS concepts to create a game similar like Mario, Blog Site using mySQL and REST API, Social Media app using MongoDB and Mongoose, React Basics and TODO list using React JS etc.

highlights.head: Why choose CB Live:
highlights.description: Two-Way Interaction: Share screen with your mentor for any doubt resolution 24*7.Placement Support: From Interview recommendations to placement, we are there for you at every step.Get into Bigwigs: Our expert will help you crack interviews for Amazon, Microsoft, Apple, Google, and Facebook.

highlights.head: This course is essential for you:
highlights.description: If you want to have Web dev as a career.If you love solving real-world problems and want to create a solution.

schedule.description: Introduction to HTML, HTML Tags, Block and inline elements,Tables, inputs, forms
Advance HTML Tags and Media tags, Understanding CSS Basics, Psuedo classes, Combinators, Selectors and CSS Properties, Precedence
CSS Units and Box Model, Pseudo classes & Elements, Font-Families, List and Shadows, Adding Image and text, Pseudo Classes
Flex Boxes, Media Queries
Border, Background, Transitions,Transforms, 3D Transform & Animations
Grids + Flexboxes Layouts
Creating a website using Bootstrap
Introduction to JavaScript, Strongly v/s Weakly v/s Static vs Dynamic Typed, Loops in JS, JS datatypes ,Objects, Type Casting, Higher Order Functions, Scopes, Hoisting, Closure
Async Functions and OOP, Prototypes, this keyword, Class Syntax, Try and Catch
Different programming and paradigms, Lambda Functions, Scopes in JS, inbuilt functions in JS
Introduction to DOM, window element,events and Event Listener and BOM
Creating a Game using JS concepts
Creating Todo List using Jquery
Making XMLHttpRequest using JS and API creation
Git and GitHub
Understanding what is  NodeJs, Exploring Centralised Package Manager, NPM modules, Terminal application, Destructuring, Dependency Graph, Advance File System, async and await
Express, Status Code, Creating Servers with Express. Requests using Express,, CRUD Operations, Routers
Understanding Templating Language HBS.Passing data from the server to template and vice versa, Creating layouts/partials with HBS, Understanding Databases, Data Relationships, Designing a Data Model.
Understanding RESTful APIs and Get/POST request
Understanding SQL and CRUD operations, via Blog Site Project
Why Mongo, Installing Mongo, Mongo Shell, Inserting , Finding, Updating and Deleting with Mongo, What is Mongoose, Insert Many, Finding, Updating and Deleting with Mongoose
Implementation of Social Media App via Moongoose and Express
Understanding Middlewares and E-Commerce Site-1
E-Commerce Site- 2 (Adding features like comments, reviews etc.)
Learning Cookies and Adding more features to our E-Commerce site
Learning Authentication and store data securely in databases
Learning Authentication(OAUTH) and Adding Login via Google, Facebook, Twitter to E-Commerce Site
Adding Styles to Site and How to store multimedia in our E-Commerce Site.
Creating Landing Page and Deployment
Creating a Chatting Application via sockets
Chai and Mocha
Basics of ReactJS
React Project and Web-Dev way forward
